EmailTemplate.name: Pending Manual Changes
EmailTemplate.Body:
$launcher is requesting the following changes for '$identityDisplayName' be manually made by you.
#if ( $approvalSet.items ) #foreach ($item in $approvalSet.items) Application: $item.applicationName #if ( $item.nativeIdentity ) Account : $item.nativeIdentity #end #if ( $item.instance ) Instance : $item.instance #end Operation: $item.operation #if ( $item.displayName ) Attribute: $item.displayName #elseif ( $item.name ) Attribute: $item.name #end #if ( $item.displayValue ) Value(s): $item.displayValue #elseif ( $item.csv ) Value(s): $item.csv #end #if ( $item.requesterComments ) Requester Comments: $item.requesterComments #end #end #end
EmailTemplate.Description: Email Template for notifying approvers when they need to do perform an account action manually Note that in addition to the declared arguments, all workflow variables, Step arguments, and Approval arguments defined in the Workflow are also available.

Argument.name: approvalSet
Argument.Description: The ApprovalSet object contained in the work item.

Argument.name: launcher
Argument.Description: The name of the Identity that launched the workflow.

Argument.name: identityName
Argument.Description: The name of the Identity that is being changed.

Argument.name: identityDisplayName
Argument.Description: The display name of the Identity that is being changed.

EmailTemplate.Subject: Changes requested to $identityDisplayName need manual interaction
